TopicTitle: Maybe a stock mod and part creator?

Articles.Content: I think that a system for making your own mods and custom parts would be awesome.Something that allows for a part to have moving components as well.
So, blender, ms paint, config file and whatever else is in the process? With proper API it should be easy.

On 12/12/2021 at 7:43 PM, The Aziz said:

So, blender, ms paint, config file and whatever else is in the process? With proper API it should be easy.

Yes the problem with modding is the overhead to get going and keep going. A good API that helps avoids boilerplate and eases the path to get your part into the game is the key. Then people have a big range the standard tools to use and a vast array of tutorials about the tools to draw on. 
 

that said subassemblies and ingame automation should be improved in any way that makes then a gateway to modding.
